Pre-Game Insights: The Pirates have lost each of their last five games following a win.
The Yankees have won six of their last seven day games at Yankee Stadium following a loss.
The Pirates have failed to cover the run line in each of their last six games as underdogs following a win.
The Yankees have covered the run line in three of their last four games against teams that held a losing record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seven of the Pirates' last eight day games after playing the previous day have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Each of the Yankees' last four games as favorites against National League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Yankees' last 10 home games against NL Central opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Pirates' last four games as underdogs.
